name: schematic-capture-be
description: REST API for the schematic capture app using the Express framework

scripts.coverage: cross-env DB_ENV=test DB_PORT=5435 DB_PASSWORD=testing123! jest --coverage --detectOpenHandles --forceExit || true
scripts.test-migrate-latest: cross-env DB_ENV=test DB_PORT=5435 DB_PASSWORD=testing123! knex --env test migrate:latest
scripts.test-migrate-rollback: cross-env DB_ENV=test DB_PORT=5435 DB_PASSWORD=testing123! knex --env test migrate:rollback
scripts.test-seed: cross-env DB_ENV=test DB_PORT=5435 DB_PASSWORD=testing123! knex --env test seed:run
scripts.start: npx knex migrate:latest ; npx knex seed:run ; node index.js
